jd: From: Shashank Bajpai, Sita Consulting shashank@scstech.us Reply to: shashank@scstech.us 📢 State of Michigan – Project Manager 3 Opportunity🕒 Submission Deadline: 11/1 at 10 AM EST📍 Location: Lansing, MI – Hybrid (Onsite Tuesday & Wednesday)📅 Duration: 1 Year (with potential extension)💼 Interviews: MS Teams Video (Camera ON)🚗 Parking: $5/day; passes available through DTMB Role Overview:The State of Michigan is seeking a skilled Project Manager 3 to lead a complex $20 million modernization project. This hybrid role requires strong change and vendor management skills, along with proficiency in Microsoft DevOps.General Responsibilities:Project Leadership: Design, plan, and coordinate cross-functional teams; manage scope, budget, and schedule using PMI’s framework.Stakeholder Communication: Establish communication plans and risk mitigation strategies, effectively engaging with project sponsors and team members.Team Management: Assign responsibilities, foster collaboration, and evaluate outcomes to ensure productivity and quality.Change Management: Organize resources to monitor and adjust project plans as needed, ensuring alignment with business objectives.Technical Support: Offer guidance to team members on complex application features and systems integration.Performance Oversight: Track progress, take corrective actions, and prepare progress reports for leadership.Top Skills & Required Experience:5+ years managing projects with budgets over $5 million.5+ years Agile Leadership experience.10+ years in project management (recent position).2+ years Microsoft DevOps experience.Collaboration Skills: Experience coordinating with other project managers for seamless technology integration.Clear and Concise Communication: Strong communication skills for stakeholder interactions.Previous experience with the State of Michigan is a plus!This role offers a chance to make a significant impact on a high-stakes modernization initiative within the State of Michigan. Local candidates only, please. Apply today to be part of an innovative team driving change!
